projects.title: Portfolio Project
projects.description: This Portfolio Platform is a responsive personal website I built using React.js and Chakra UI, featuring About, Resume, and Portfolio pages. The About page introduces myself and my skills, the Resume page highlights my work experience, education, and includes a downloadable CV, while the Portfolio page showcases my projects with image galleries and tech stack tags. Although created as my personal site, it is open-source and easily customizable—anyone can adapt it by modifying the JSON file in the data directory and updating images and CV in the public folder.

projects.title: Dohzay Seller Center
projects.description: The Dohzay Seller Center provides sellers to create and manage their own online stores based on product categories. Sellers can list their products for customers in both local and supported cross-border markets through the Dohzay Mobile app. This platform helps businesses extend their reach across the countries currently supported by Dohzay, making cross-border selling straightforward and accessible.

projects.title: Dohzay Mobile
projects.description: Dohzay Mobile is a cross-border e-commerce application that allows customers to purchase a wide range of products including clothing, electronics, pet supplies, and more. The app offers a variety of features such as advanced product search, category-based browsing, shopping cart management, and seamless order tracking.

projects.title: Dohzay Warehouse Management System
projects.description: Dohzay Warehouse Management supports regional warehouse operations to streamline inventory and delivery processes. Warehouse owners can manage product stock—especially grocery items—to ensure timely and efficient fulfillment. This system helps meet customer demand by allowing users to place orders from nearby warehouses based on availability and location.

projects.title: Venture Mobile
projects.description: Venture Mobile is a church management application designed to support church planters in organizing and overseeing their churches, contacts, and communities. The app includes features for managing church profiles, tracking community engagement, and maintaining contact records. To enhance user experience and functionality, Google Maps API is integrated to display and manage church locations. The app also integrates Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) to receive real-time push notifications, allowing church planters to stay informed about updates and important messages initiated from the web platform.

projects.title: Venture Admin Panel
projects.description: Venture Web is the administrative platform for managing church planters, churches, communities, contacts, and users. It is designed to provide movement leaders and administrators with comprehensive tools to oversee and support field operations. The system includes role-based access control, allowing users to view and manage data relevant to their roles—whether as an admin, movement leader, or church planter. Admin users can directly create and manage churches, communities, contacts, and user accounts through the web interface. The platform also supports dynamic language switching, enabling users to interact with the system in their preferred language. Additionally, the web platform integrates Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) to both send and receive notifications. This enables administrators to push real-time updates to mobile users and receive important events or alerts within the system.

projects.title: CMS Platform
projects.description: This CMS Platform is a full-stack content management system I built as a personal project using Nuxt.js, Laravel, and MySQL. It enables users to register accounts, manage their own blog posts, and engage with other users through comments and likes. Authentication is handled via Laravel Sanctum, ensuring secure access. Users can edit their profiles, create and delete posts, and upload images, which are stored as BLOBs in the database for optimized management. The system is designed to be lightweight yet flexible, making it ideal for multi-user blogging communities or personal publishing tools.
